alert.note: Alert for Eastern Aleutians (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued October 08 at 3:11PM AKDT until October 10 at 1:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 50 mph with gusts up to 75 mph possible. * WHERE...Eastern Aleutians, including Unalaska. * WHEN...From late Sunday night through Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...An area of low pressure will track along and just north of the Aleutians Sunday night into Monday. Strong west to northwest winds will develop to the south of the low center as it skirts just north of the Eastern Aleutians. Additionally, cold air advection on the backside of the low will help to enhance gusty winds.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
